blog.name: gameofavatars
blog.title: Game of Avatars
blog.description: An incorrect quote blog for Game of Thrones/A Song of Ice and Fire and Avatar: The Last Airbender/The Legend of Korra.

summary: There are older men, better men. I am still as green as summer grass. I’m wounded, and I stand accused of treason.
text: There are older men, better men. I am still as green as summer grass. I’m wounded, and I stand accused of treason.
source: Zuko [about assuming the throne, to Iroh], Book 3

reblog.comment: Zuko [about assuming the throne, to Iroh], Book 3

summary: Finally who the hell they are .....
body:
Jonsa fans logic:

Sansa fight during years for survive she can’t die right now.

Jonsa fans again:

Dany will die next season.


Jonsa Fans again:

Jon and Dany can’t be together. It’s not Disney

Jonsa fans again:

Jon and Sansa will merry and be happy together


Jonsa fans again:

Jon and Dany can’t be together. They are aunt and nephewz

Jonsa fans again:

Jon and Sansa will be together. There is no problem cousins


Jonsa fans again:

Sansa holds Jon’s hand they are romantically couple.

Jonsa fans again:

Jon holds Dany’s hand but he tries to manipulate her because of her army. ( especially he already has her army )


Jonsa fans again:

Sansa is key of North

Another fandom of Game of Thrones

Idiooooooots Jon is the king inthe North


Jonsa fans again:

There is no time for love

Jonsa fans again:

There is time of dark Dany, manipulative Jon, and finaly they have a lot of times for new “love story of Jonsa” 😭😭😭😭😭


Jonsa fans again:

Every foreshadow isn’t romantically. Every foreshadow isn’t about love

Jonsa fans again:

Jon and Sansa foreshadow ( What really no existing) is about their love and romance


Jonsa fans again:

Jon loves readheads

Five book “Dance with the dragons”:

Jon looked at Val’s blonde hair and he looked silver- pale 😭😭😭


Jonsa fans again:

Sansa has Northern and Vale army. Jon needs her

Jon’s thought From the book:

“He could think about army but Dragons… three of them “😭😭😭😭


Jonsa fans Again:

Jon is a true Stark and bla bla bla bla

Season 7 episode 3:

“ I am not a Stark” 😭😭😭😭


Jonsa fans Again:

Jon and Sansa are Ned and Catelyn. They are in Love

Book:

Ned merried with Catelyn for army😭😭😭his true love was Lady Ashara Dane. Only Daenerys is like her in book 😭😭😭


Jonsa fans again:

Sansa is Catelyn Stark.

Total shock:

Jon Snow merry with Catelyn Stark 2

Jon Snow merry with Catelyn Stark 2

Jon Snow merry with Catelyn Stark 2

Jon Snow merry with Catelyn Stark 2

Jon Snow merry with Catelyn Stark 2

Jon Snow merry with Catelyn Stark 2

Jon Snow merry with Catelyn Stark 2

Jon Snow merry with Catelyn Stark 2



Jonsa Fans again:

Sansa and Jon are Rhaegar and Lyanna

Season 7 episode 7:

Paralel scene of Rhaegar and Lyanna


Jonsa fans again:

Jon and sansa are parallel of Jaime and Briene

Jonsa fans again:

Jon and sansa are Sam and Gilly

Jonsa fans again:

Jon and sansa are Jaime and Cersei


Jonsa fans again:

Sansa is Alysanne Targaryen

GRRM:

“ she will be great queen and I know it”-Alysanne about her daughter Daenerys


Jonsa fans again:

Jon and Sansa are…

Another Game Of Thrones fandom:

Finally who the hell they are …..


Jonsa fans again:

Season 8 teaser with Jon and Sansa reunion is spoiler about Jonsa endgame

Jonsa fans again:

HBO couldn’t give such a great spoiler with Entertainment Weekly cover 😭😭😭😭

summary:
I read very interesting theory about this scene. 
Cersei send Golden Company to  take Dany from Winterfell and she is her...
body:
I read very interesting theory about this scene.

Cersei send Golden Company to take Dany from Winterfell and she is her prissioner latter. Cersei invites Jon in capital for bend the knee. She knows that Jon is Rhaegar’s son.

Iconic word “risk “from first teaser is about that.

Jon risk his life for Dany and travel in capital for her.

Cersei and Jon meet each other in Capital.

summary: The Dragon Prince and the She-Wolf.
title: The Dragon Prince and the She-Wolf.
description:
by Darkangel3198

King Rhaegar sent his second son to Winterfell to wed Sansa Stark, hoping that the marriage will heal the old wounds but his son, just like the father chose the fierce she-wolf.

Words: 2491, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Game of Thrones (TV), A Song of Ice and Fire - George R. R. Martin, A Song of Ice and Fire & Related Fandoms
  • Rating: Explicit
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Categories: F/M
  • Characters: Arya Stark, Jon Snow, Sansa Stark, Ned Stark, Arthur Dayne
  • Relationships: Jon Snow/Arya Stark, Jon Snow/Sansa Stark(one sided)
  • Additional Tags: Alternate Universe - Canon Divergence, Alternate Universe - Rhaegar won, Explicit Sexual Content, Cunnilingus, Vaginal Fingering, Loss of Virginity, Smut, Jon is 19 and Arya is 16

tags: they are the song of ice and fire
summary: Video by ScreenCrush This video give a quick explanation on how Jon’s and Daenerys’ journey directly parallel and mirror each...
caption:
Video by ScreenCrush

This video give a quick explanation on how Jon’s and Daenerys’ journey directly parallel and mirror each other, showing some of the main reasons as to why their relationship is one aspect of asoiaf - with Jon representing “ice” and Dany representing “fire”.

reblog.comment:
Video by ScreenCrush

This video give a quick explanation on how Jon’s and Daenerys’ journey directly parallel and mirror each other, showing some of the main reasons as to why their relationship is one aspect of asoiaf - with Jon representing “ice” and Dany representing “fire”.

they both respect each other too much for that
summary: Video by Charisma on Demand Here’s is some of my fave quotes from the creator of this video: “Jon is also willing to tell Dany...
caption:
Video by Charisma on Demand

Here’s is some of my fave quotes from the creator of this video:

“Jon is also willing to tell Dany the truth even when she might not like it.”

“He cares more about her character and it’s not until he sees her perform an act of true sacrifice and valor that he names her his queen.”

“His dedication to others isn’t some ploy intended to curry her favor, it’s the genuine article. And because she finds out about his scars without him directly having to tell her, it adds even more to his legitimacy as a purpose-driven leader.” 

“But the reason that Dany is falling in love with Jon, and Jon with Dany, is because they each care more about the other than looks and power; it’s because Jon lives for a cause that is bigger than his own pleasure and so does Dany. They both have high standards for each other- Jon for her, and her for him.”

tags: when he makes the rules it'll be interesting
though Jon does not seem to value much women who do not pick up arms I've noticed
summary: Jon shrugged. "Girls get the arms but not the swords. Bastards get the swords but not the arms. I did not make the rules, little...
body:
Jon shrugged. “Girls get the arms but not the swords. Bastards get the swords but not the arms. I did not make the rules, little sister.”

Pst, fandom. Discuss this quote.

reblog.comment:

Pst, fandom. Discuss this quote.

trail.content_raw:

trail.content:
Jon shrugged. “Girls get the arms but not the swords. Bastards get the swords but not the arms. I did not make the rules, little sister.”

Pst, fandom. Discuss this quote.

blog.name: nightqueendany
blog.title: The Daenerys Defense
blog.description: Hi, I'm Lauren. I'm a Santa Cruzian. Yes as in Banana Slugs. Yes, as in the tee-shirt John Travolta wears in Pulp Fiction. I'm a GOT fan. Daenerys stan. I try to be diplomatic but sometimes swear words come out. Deal with it.  Sideblog for asks: asknightqueendany.tumblr.com

tags: to break up the monotony of all those anti asks!
caption: Nuzzle nuzzle nuzzle
